thread.title: Teresa Giudice Shares Photo of Daughter Gia Driving Herself to School: 'When Did This Happen?'
thread.title_full: Teresa Giudice Shares Photo of Daughter Gia Driving Herself to School: 'When Did This Happen?'

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Teresa Giudice Shares Photo of Daughter Gia Driving Herself to School: 'When Did This Happen?'
text:
Teresa Giudice Shares Photo of Daughter Gia Driving Herself to School: 'When Did This Happen?' by Latifah Muhammad 5:02 PM PST, February 01, 2017 Photo: Instagram Teresa Giudice's oldest daughter is officially driving! The Real Housewives of New Jersey star took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a photo of 16-year-old Gia driving to school. RELATED: Teresa Giudice Flaunts Toned Figure During Beach Day With Daughters -- See the Pics! 
While the teen only has a learner's permit, she looked pretty comfortable behind the wheel of her mom's Lexus SUV. "Look who is driving my car to school with me in it. When did this happen??ðŸ™ˆ #drivingpermit#mybabyisnotababyanymore," Teresa wrote with a crying emoji. A photo posted by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on Feb 1, 2017 at 6:01am PST READ: Teresa Giudice Turns Heads in Sparkly Pink Power Jumpsuit -- See the Pic! The mother of four has been holding down the fort while her husband, Joe Giudice, is serving a 41-month sentence at Ft. Dix Federal Prison. Last October, Teresa opened up to ET about how her husband has been adjusting to life behind bars. "He is doing as well as could be expected," she told ET at Mohegan Sun's 20th anniversary party in Connecticut. "I talk to him all of the time. We email. Every day I speak to him." The reality star also gushed about her kids, Gia, Gabriella, Milania and Audriana. "My kids, they do a lot," she said. "They have a lot of activities and they keep me busy, so the days fly by. Thank God for them."
